knimeNode.name: Checkstyle adapter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Checkstyle Adapter. ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

intro.p: This node can be used to read data from Checkstyle report(XML format). Only file are retrieved.

For further information about report generation please refer to Checkstyle documentation.
Checkstyle home page: http://checkstyle.sourceforge.net/

Please check workflow examples here or inside plugin jar.
Copyright (c) ImpressiveCode, DePress Project

fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file. When you press ENTER, the file is analyzed and the settings pre-set. You can also choose a previously read file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the checkstyle file.
